title: E-Learning Practical Competency Enhancement: Conceptual Framework for Educational Technology Integration Capacity Building

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can establish technology integration strategies when designing language lessons by utilizing the ITD (Information, Technology, Instructional Design) framework.
Learners can create a long-term instructional improvement roadmap by applying the educational technology integration lifecycle model.
Learners can suggest methods to enhance learner engagement by 20% or more through PBL (Project-Based Learning)-oriented language lesson design using digital tools.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
